topic.title: Customize to Render EPS and AI Images

body.p:
Most EPS and AI image files include a preview picture of the content. tries to render this preview picture. The following scenarios are possible:
the EPS or AI image does not include the preview picture. cannot render the image.
the EPS image includes a TIFF preview picture.Some newer versions of the TIFF picture preview are rendered in gray-scale.
the AI image contains a JPEG preview picture. renders the image correctly.
